channel.title: Homes on Global Day of Coderetreat 2021 by swkWien at Nagarro
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Global Day of Coderetreat 2021 by swkWien at Nagarro

item.description: Global Day of Coderetreat by swkWien at Nagarro A day of deliberate practice and learning. TODO: Schedule Code of Conduct Mindset Dinner Thx nagarro Feedback form Join SWK Facilitators (in order of appearance) …
Kata 🐍 Snake Game TODO: Describe Kata …
Session 1 Pen and Paper Facilitator: Claus Aichinger 🤝 Find a Pair 📝 Pen & Paper 🤔 Retrospective ☕ Enjoy the Break

Session 2 First attempt to make small steps Facilitator: Peter Kofler, @codecopkofler TDD with Ping Pong Let’s do TDD and Pair Programming in a strict way, switching after each increment: A writes a test and sees that it fails. B writes the code needed to pass the test. A (or B) refactors the code as needed. B writes next test and sees that it fails. A writes the code needed to pass the test.

Session 3 Make Even Smaller Steps! Facilitator: Paul Rohorzka, @paulroho Take Baby Steps! Why Should I Take Baby Steps? Your 🧠 is limited A free mind works better Ingeniuity seldom works Steady progress feels great TDD Baby Steps Flow Choose a step Set timer Code! 🤓 Works? → Repeat ⏲ Time out? reset --hard Make the step smaller! → Repeat But How Small?
Session 4 Minimalist Coder Facilitator: Rea Sutter 🤝 Find a Pair 📝 Minimalist Coder 🤔 Retrospective ☕ Enjoy the Break
Session 5 TCR - Test Commit Revert Facilitator: Adam Zielinski 🤝 Find a Pair 📝 TCR - Test Commit Revert 🤔 Retrospective ☕ Enjoy the Break
